body_text:
This is a parallel PR to mozilla/normandy-actions#4, adding support for the new method of loading and executing actions. It simplifies a fair amount of code, which is nice.
I'm avoiding documenting any of these changes yet until the API is settled. I also need to decide whether the documentation should live in the normandy service docs, or the action repo docs. Or somewhere else. I dunno.
Also I had to include two new JS libraries, so it was time to switch to something better for managing our frontend dependencies. I'm fairly sure this should work so long as the docker image ships with NPM, but I'm not 100% on that. Guidance on this would be appreciated.
